name: Rap Freyr
description:
Voice control game. A Game that require microphones  :)

You are the chosen one.

You have a magical ability , if you sing, you will save the dying plants.

 Your singing is so beautiful that the plants which hear your singing will naturally 

recover their vitality .

The louder you sing, the faster you save.

 But there is a defect.
You can ONLY sing once in a row . Once you stop, you lose the  power.

Save a certain amount of plants and get enough score to move on to the next level.

 So let's start your Freestyle!
Do your best to keep them alive! 

Rules: WASD move 
               sing or rap to the microphone

Our first game and our first game jam  

Hope you enjoy fun :)
